title: 6.4 Master Challenge 3
question: Write a Java program to create a 2D array with random values. Find the even number count in each row and column. Use row-major order to count the even numbers in each row. Use column-major order to count the even numbers in each column.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
